com.immortallabs.cardboard.game
Enum CardBoardMessage

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<CardBoardMessage>
      com.immortallabs.cardboard.game.CardBoardMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CardBoardMessage>
public enum CardBoardMessage
extends java.lang.Enum<CardBoardMessage>

The CardBoardMessage class models any of the various messages displayed to the user. While each message type has default text, the messages can be changed to suit the specific situation.

Operations:
  • The CardBoardMessage class change the text of the message
  • The CardBoardMessage class can provide the English text of a message

Version:
1.0, March 8th, 2009
Author:
Justin C. Appler, Immortal Labs, CSC309 W09
See Also:
GameState, GameWindow
Version History:
- 03/08/09 1.0 Initial Class Design & Implementation

Enum Constant Summary
CANNOT_USE_HINT
          The message displayed when a hint cannot be used
CORRECT_SET
          The message displayed when a set is found
EXPLANATION
          The message shown when the user requests a valid or invalid set explanation.
GAME_WON
          The message displayed when the game has been won
INVALID_SET
          The message displayed when an invalid set is found
MUST_BUZZ_IN
          The message displayed a card is clicked in multiplayer while no player is currently buzzed in
NO_HINT_IN_COMPETITIVE
          The message displayed when a hint is attempted in competitive
NO_SET_ON_BOARD
          The message displayed when there is no set on the board
NO_SET_TIMER_EXPIRATION
          The message displayed when the timer expires and there was not set on the board
THREE_MORE_WHILE_SET
          The message displayed when 3 more is selected and there is a set on the board.
TIMER_EXPIRATION
          The message displayed when the timer expires
